result.title: Functional Programming Contest, Lambda Calculi May'14
result.content:
Lambda Calculi (Functional Programming Contest) is back with 5 interesting new challenges lined up for May edition. The contest will commence at 6 30 AM UTC, 16th May and will run for a extended period of 10 days. You can sign up for the contest here. Registration will be open till the end of contest.

This contest is primarily aimed for the functional programming enthusiasts and whosoever interested in learning this.

May contest have been prepared by Pavel Lepin, Shen Chao, Grant Boudreaux and me.

Languages allowed are: Haskell, Scala, Lisp, Erlang, Clojure, OCaml and F#.
